SEARCHLASTNAME.SLastname(`${getHotelInfo.hotelsData.ip}:${getHotelInfo.hotelsData.port}`, {
     // linkstart: linkstart,
     description: description,
     postinquiry: postinquiry
}).then(response => {
     res.send(response);
     WRITEINLOG.WriteLogSuccessful("Postrequest", JSON.stringify(response));
}).catch(err => {
     res.send(err);
     WRITEINLOG.WriteLogError("GetHuespedLastname", err);
 });
